nl.naturalis.common.function.IntRelation

Packages that use IntRelation
Package Description

Classes related to checking preconditions
nl.naturalis.common.function
Classes and interfaces related to functional programming.

  • Uses of IntRelation in nl.naturalis.common.check

    Methods in nl.naturalis.common.check that return IntRelation
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static IntRelation CommonChecks.eq()
    Verifies that the argument is equal to a particular value.
    static IntRelation CommonChecks.gt()
    Verifies that the argument is greater than a particular value.
    static IntRelation CommonChecks.gte()
    Verifies that the argument is greater than or equal to a particular value.
    static IntRelation CommonChecks.lt()
    Verifies that the argument is less than a particular value.
    static IntRelation CommonChecks.lte()
    Verifies that the argument is less than or equal to a particular value.
    static IntRelation CommonChecks.multipleOf()
    Verifies that the argument is a whole mulitple of a particular integer.
    static IntRelation CommonChecks.ne()
    Verifies that the argument is not equal to a particular value.
